name: terra-alert
description: The Terra Alert component is a notification banner that can be rendered in your application when there is information that you want to bring to the user's attention. The Alert component supports a number of built-in notification types that render with pre-defined colors and icons that help the user understand the severity and meaning of the notification. A custom notification type is also supported that allows your application to customize an alert that may not fit into the pre-defined types.
author: Cerner Corporation

scripts.compile: npm run compile:clean && npm run compile:build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss
scripts.test: npm run test:spec && npm run test:nightwatch-default
scripts.test:all: npm run test:nightwatch-default && npm run test:nightwatch-chrome && npm run test:nightwatch-firefox && npm run test:nightwatch-safari
